io.netty.handler.codec.marshalling

Class DefaultMarshallerProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.marshalling.DefaultMarshallerProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarshallerProvider

    public class DefaultMarshallerProvider
extends Object
implements MarshallerProvider
    Default implementation of MarshallerProvider which just create a new Marshaller on ever getMarshaller(ChannelHandlerContext) call.
